inscription:
Title and Inscription

below iamge on mount, printed in black: [Deposé. / Photographed by R. Fenton. Manchester, Published by T. Agnew & Sons. April 5th, 1856. / London, P & D. Colnagni H. (?) Paris, Moulin, 23 Rue Richer. New York, Williams HC. (?)]; LRC on mount, in pencil: [245]
signed: on back of mount, LLC, in brown ink: [63x. Commander Ballan on the / Staff of General Bosquet]
title: Commander Ballan on the Staff of General Bosquet (Crimean War)
